Maven plugin for generating JNI headers
Last Published: 11 Apr 2013  | Version: 1.0
Overview
  • Introduction
  • Goals
  • Github project

jni-headers:javah

Full name:

com.alexkasko.maven:jni-headers-maven-plugin:1.0:javah

Description:

Runs javah utility on provided class and writes generated header to specified location.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
javahClass String - Class to run javah on
User property is: javahclass.
javahOutputFilePath File - Path to output header file
User property is: javahOutputFile.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
javahPath File - Path to javah executable
User property is: javahPath.
javahVerbose boolean - -verbose parameter to "javah"
Default value is: false.
User property is: javahVerbose.

Parameter Details

javahClass:

Class to run javah on
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: javahclass

javahOutputFilePath:

Path to output header file
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: javahOutputFile

javahPath:

Path to javah executable
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • User Property: javahPath

javahVerbose:

-verbose parameter to "javah"
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: javahVerbose
  • Default: false
